QuestionStem: The diagram shows the snake’s skeletal system. Which other body system works with the skeletal system to help provide movement?
CorrectFeedback: The snake’s respiratory system provides oxygen to its cells. Cells use this and nutrients from the digestive system for energy. Its muscular and skeletal systems use energy to move.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Each level of organization in the muscular system requires a source of energy.
IncorrectFeedback: Each level of organization in the muscular system requires a source of energy.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: The snake’s respiratory system provides oxygen to its cells. Cells use this and nutrients from the digestive system for energy. Its muscular and skeletal systems use energy to move.
